title: Finding Peace with Rapper Raja Kumari
description:
Raja Kumari is a trailblazer — and she doesn’t slow down for anyone. But this year, the pandemic didn’t give her much of a choice. Staying at home was a big change… but it was a good one. Because it’s brought her closer to something she values more and more: peace. And now, she wants to share it with everyone.

Follow Raja on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

To listen to Raja’s music on your platform of choice, check out her website

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
